thread.title: 12 Times Miss Grotke From "Recess" Was Progressive As Fuck
thread.title_full: 12 Times Miss Grotke From "Recess" Was Progressive As Fuck

author: Casey Rackham
title: 12 Times Miss Grotke From "Recess" Was Progressive As Fuck
text:
View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301826 2. …which resulted in them creating a society that is biased in favor of one gender over the other. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301837 3. When she knew the best medicine for a repressive government. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301834 4. When she revealed the true theme of Beowulf . View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301864 5. When she called out some barbarians… View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301827 6. …and then some savages. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10302090 7. When she casually mentioned that history tends to focus on white males… View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301831 8. …so she made sure to teach her class about important women in history. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301836 9. When she showed that women can choose to groom their natural hair however their heart desires. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301830 10. When she knew parents are parents, no matter what. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301828 11. When she explained the importance of human beings working together. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10302091 12. And finally, when she called for the youth to do what they must. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301824
